title: LOOKING FOR TOP MID AND JUNGLER FOR FLEX TEAM
body:
I'm putting together a flex team to play regularly. Aiming for a friendly environment and be able to learn from each other and work together. Currently have a bot lane and need to fill the other 3 roles.

ADC Solo/duo rank: Gold 2
Support Solo/duo rank: Gold 1

Requirements:
Silver 3 +
Must have a working mic and be willing to download/use discord.

Add/msg me ingame if interested.

IGN:GrrGrrGadgetHook

replies.body: Top main, G1. Have added you

i'm a mid main who can play alot of play styles 
Rank: Gold 3
Champs: Karthus, Ahri, Ekko, Ziggs
Laning: passive
